name: Paranormal Street Raider (RandomyGames)
description:
Climb the Bizarre Tower of Doom! The world's fate depends on you and your skills, although you might need more than once try. Do impossible jumps, evade lethal bullets and take care of the spikes!

It was made following the CPCRetroDev 2020 competition, getting classified into the finals.

A game by DavianShadow (currently RandomyGames members) developed with Z80 Assembly.
